questions: What is 1/2 of 12? (Hint: Divide 12 by 2)
What is 1/4 of 20? (Hint: Divide 20 by 4)
What is 3/5 of 10? (Hint: Divide 10 by 5, then multiply by 3)
What is 2/3 of 9? (Hint: Divide 9 by 3, then multiply by 2)
What is 1/3 of 15? (Hint: Divide 15 by 3)
Raj has 10 apples. What is 1/5 of them? (Hint: Divide 10 by 5)
Tia has 16 books. What is 1/4 of her books? (Hint: Divide 16 by 4)
Sam has 12 pencils. What is 2/3 of his pencils? (Hint: Divide 12 by 3, then multiply by 2)
Kim has 20 balls. What is 3/4 of them? (Hint: Divide 20 by 4, then multiply by 3)
Ben has 8 pens. What is 1/2 of his pens? (Hint: Divide 8 by 2)

Share 9 cookies among 3 people. What fraction each? (Hint: Each gets 1/3)

Share 15 apples among 5 friends. What fraction each? (Hint: Each gets 1/5)

From 12 eggs, 5 are broken. What fraction broken? (Hint: 5/12)
Out of 7 flowers, 3 are red. What fraction red? (Hint: 3/7)

Is 1/6 less than 4/6? (Hint: Yes, smaller top)
Which is smaller: 7/10 or 3/10? (Hint: 3/10 has smaller numerator)

Which is bigger: 2/3 or 2/5? (Hint: Same top, smaller bottom wins)
Compare 1/2 and 1/4. Which is larger? (Hint: 1/2 has smaller denominator)
Is 3/4 greater than 3/6? (Hint: Yes, 3/4 smaller bottom)
Which is smaller: 4/5 or 4/10? (Hint: 4/10)
Compare 5/6 and 5/8. Which is bigger? (Hint: 5/6)
Is 3/4 more or less than 1/2? (Hint: 1/2 is 2/4, so 3/4 is more)
Compare 1/3 to 1/2. Is it less? (Hint: Yes, 1/3 < 1/2)
Is 5/6 greater than 1/2? (Hint: 1/2 is 3/6, so yes)
Compare 2/5 to 1/2. Is it less? (Hint: 2/5 = 4/10, 1/2=5/10)
Is 7/8 more than 1/2? (Hint: Yes, 1/2 is 4/8)
1/2 is the same as ?/4 (Hint: Look at pizza cut into 4)
2/4 equals ?/8 (Hint: Double top and bottom)
3/6 is same as ?/2 (Hint: Half top and bottom)
1/3 equals ?/6 (Hint: Double top and bottom)
4/8 is same as ?/2 (Hint: Half top and bottom)
Multiply top and bottom of 1/2 by 3: ?/? (Hint: 3/6)
Divide top and bottom of 4/8 by 2: ?/? (Hint: 2/4)
Multiply 2/3 by 2: ?/? (Hint: 4/6)

Multiply 1/4 by 5: ?/? (Hint: 5/20)
